messages.subject: Re: the end!
messages.msgSnippet: Just so you know, i posted my other post before I read this.  I d be HAPPY if this list moved on! Not another word from me about it! Joanna ... the ... back
messages.messageBody:
Just so you know, i posted my other post before I read this. I'd be
HAPPY if this list moved on!
Not another word from me about it!
Joanna

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Kolleen <Kolleen@m...> wrote:
> Okay folks we have a choice,
>
> We can end this talk right now. Nobody replies to this email and
the
> person who suggested we don't discuss discussion (metatalk) can sit
back
> and relax knowing that she made a great contribution
>
> OR
>
> We can keep watching people drop like flies, the emails dwindle to
little
> input and the reputation of what once was a highly recommended list
turn
> to less than desireable.
>
>
> Our choice, we're in this together.
>
>
> regards,
> kolleen

messages.subject: the end!
messages.msgSnippet: Okay folks we have a choice, We can end this talk right now. Nobody replies to this email and the person who suggested we don t discuss discussion (metatalk)
messages.messageBody:
Okay folks we have a choice,

We can end this talk right now. Nobody replies to this email and the
person who suggested we don't discuss discussion (metatalk) can sit back
and relax knowing that she made a great contribution

OR

We can keep watching people drop like flies, the emails dwindle to little
input and the reputation of what once was a highly recommended list turn
to less than desireable.


Our choice, we're in this together.


regards,
kolleen
